info.title: AzureArcDataManagementClient
info.description: The AzureArcData management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs to manage Azure Data Services on Azure Arc Resources.

ActiveDirectoryConnectorListResult.description: A list of active directory connectors

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

ActiveDirectoryConnectorProperties.description: The properties of an Active Directory connector resource

domainServiceAccountLoginInformation.description: Username and password for domain service account authentication.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Active Directory connector resource.

ActiveDirectoryConnectorSpec.description: The specifications of the AD Kubernetes resource.

realm.description: Name (uppercase) of the Active Directory domain that this AD connector will be associated with.

netbiosDomainName.description: NETBIOS name of the Active Directory domain.

serviceAccountProvisioning.description: The service account provisioning mode for this Active Directory connector.

ouDistinguishedName.description: The distinguished name of the Active Directory Organizational Unit.

domainName.description: DNS domain name for which DNS lookups should be forwarded to the Active Directory DNS servers.

nameserverIPAddresses.description: List of Active Directory DNS server IP addresses.

replicas.description: Replica count for DNS proxy service. Default value is 1.

preferK8sDnsForPtrLookups.description: Flag indicating whether to prefer Kubernetes DNS server response over AD DNS server response for IP address lookups.

ActiveDirectoryDomainControllers.description: Details about the Active Directory domain controllers associated with this AD connector instance

primaryDomainController.description: Information about the Primary Domain Controller (PDC) in the AD domain.

ActiveDirectoryDomainController.description: Information about a domain controller in the AD domain.

hostname.description: Fully-qualified domain name of a domain controller in the AD domain.

ActiveDirectorySecondaryDomainController.description: Information about the secondary domain controllers in the AD domain.

items.description: List of the fully-qualified domain names of the secondary domain controllers in the AD domain.

ActiveDirectoryConnectorStatus.description: The status of the Kubernetes custom resource.

lastUpdateTime.description: The time that the custom resource was last updated.

observedGeneration.description: The version of the replicaSet associated with the AD connector custom resource.

state.description: The state of the AD connector custom resource.
